name: Rishi's Festive Sunak Attack
description:
For best experience play on desktop.

2020 may almost be over, but there's still work to be done for the Art's Sector Elf! 

Help them survive this wretched year by jumping [space] through economic hoops and racing to collect Rishi's generous support payments (did we mention they're generous?). 

But be careful...times is hard and that money won't last forever, what with taxes and rent and the general cost of living. So best get jumping Elf, go, go, go!
